ue5_fundamentals.engine_architecture: UE5 Engine architecture, systems, and core components
ue5_fundamentals.blueprint_system: Visual scripting system for creating game logic without coding

advanced_features.nanite_technology: Virtualized geometry for massive detail and performance
advanced_features.lumen_lighting: Global illumination and dynamic lighting systems
advanced_features.world_partition: Large world streaming and level management
advanced_features.gameplay_framework: Game systems, AI, and interactive mechanics

development_workflow.project_setup: UE5 project creation, templates, and configuration
development_workflow.version_control: Source control integration and team collaboration
development_workflow.plugin_development: Custom plugin creation and marketplace integration

training_objectives: Understand UE5 engine architecture and core systems
Master Blueprint visual scripting for business automation
Create interactive 3D business applications
Integrate UE5 with external business systems
Develop UE5-based learning and training systems
Create skill progression tracking in 3D environments
Build adaptive learning experiences

assessment_criteria.knowledge_retention: Demonstrate understanding of UE5 core concepts
assessment_criteria.practical_application: Successfully create functional UE5 business applications
assessment_criteria.integration_capability: Connect UE5 with existing business systems
assessment_criteria.innovation_potential: Generate novel UE5 business use cases
